rule.name: Rule 77
rule.description: When {Installation:Installation Automatic Promotion} equals 'Yes' -> Set Value of {Installation:Apply Installation Promotion} to Yes.

rule.name: Rule 78
rule.description: When {Installation:Installation Promotion} is not '0' -> Add Attribute to Line Items {Installation:Installation Promotion}; Set Price of {Installation:Installation Promotion} to {Installation Promotion}. Otherwise: Remove Attribute from Line Items {Installation:Installation Promotion}.

rule.name: Rule 79
rule.description: When {Installation:Apply Installation Promotion} equals 'Yes' -> Set Value of Attribute Field {Installation:Installation Promotion.Kenan_Component} to {$Lookup(InstallationChargePromotionQuery):id}; Set Value of {Installation:Installation Promotion} to 0-{Installation Charge}. Otherwise: Set Value of {Installation:Installation Promotion} to 0.

rule.name: Rule 96
rule.description: When {Installation:Offer} is not '' AND {Installation:OpportunityId} is not '' -> Make Attribute Read-Only.

rule.name: Rule 97
rule.description: When {Installation:OpportunityId} is not '' -> Make Attribute Read-Only.

rule.name: Rule 100
rule.description: When {Installation:Change Type} equals 'Change' -> Make Attribute Read-Only.

rule.name: Rule 109
rule.description: When {Installation:Installation Type} equals 'Start Installation' -> Set Value of {Installation:Installation Charge} to 99; Set Price of {Installation:Installation Charge} to {Installation Charge}; Set Value of Attribute Field {Installation:Installation Charge.Kenan_Component} to {$Lookup(InstallationChargeQuery):id}. Otherwise: Set Value of {Installation:Installation Charge} to 149; Set Price of {Installation:Installation Charge} to {Installation Charge}; Set Value of Attribute Field {Installation:Installation Charge.Kenan_Component} to {$Lookup(InstallationChargeQuery):id}.

rule.name: Rule 111
rule.description: When {Devices:Recurring Charge for CPE} is greater than '0' -> Set Price of {FreePhone Business CPE:Recurring Charge for CPE} to {Recurring Charge for CPE}; Add Attribute to Line Items {FreePhone Business CPE:Recurring Charge for CPE}; Set Value of Attribute Field {FreePhone Business CPE:Recurring Charge for CPE.Kenan_Component} to {$Lookup(MonthlyRecurringChargeCPEQuery):id}.

rule.name: Rule 216
rule.description: When {Installation:BusinessInternetProductDetails} is not '' -> Set Value of {Installation:Billing Account} to {BusinessInternetProductDetails.billing_account_number__c}. Otherwise: Set Value of {Installation:Billing Account} to null.

rule.name: Rule 217
rule.description: When {Devices:BusinessInternetProductDetails} is not '' -> Set Value of {Devices:Billing Account} to {BusinessInternetProductDetails.billing_account_number__c}. Otherwise: Set Value of {Devices:Billing Account} to null.

rule.name: Rule 225
rule.description: When {Installation:UserPrivilegeInteger} equals '1' OR {Installation:UserPrivilegeInteger} equals '2' -> Make Attribute Read-Only.

predicate.name: Predicate 88
predicate.subject: a2d190000004GTjAAM
predicate.label: {Devices:Recurring Charge for CPE} is greater than '0'
